content.question: In the closing lines of the passage (“I love the mountains . . . the space”), the author affirms her sense of attachment to Wyoming by

choices.label: noting how Wyoming’s climate facilitates outdoor activities
acknowledging the exceptional nature of her family’s experiences
suggesting the economic potential of Wyoming’s natural resources
offering a poetic description of Wyoming’s natural beauty

content.answer: offering a poetic description of Wyoming’s natural beauty

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
